source.349bfd2f:
x = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, name='x', shape=None)
y = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, name='y', shape = None)
z = x*y
sess.run(z, feed_dict={x:[2, 3, 4], y:[5, 6, 7]})
source.f134e912:
xx = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, name='x', shape=[None, 3])
WW = tf.Variable(tf.random_uniform([3, 4], -1, 1), name='W')
bb = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([4]), name='bias')


output = tf.linalg.matmul(xx, WW) + bb
init = tf.initialize_all_variables()
sess=tf.Session()
sess.run(init)
feed = {xx:np.array([[3, 2, 1], 
                    [1, 1, 2],
                    [4, 5, 6],
                    [7, 7, 9],
                    [1, 0, 1],
                    [0, 0, 2]])}
sess.run(output, feed_dict=feed)
